title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.65 - Best available technologies (BATs) for disinfection byproduct control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.65 - Best available technologies (BATs) for disinfection byproduct control

State Regulations

The following is a table of the best available technology, treatment techniques, or other means available for achieving compliance with the maximum contaminant levels for Bromate, Chlorite, TTHM and HAA5, for public water systems that disinfect their source water. Click to view image

Click to view image

5-1.65

Amended

New

York State Register January 17, 2018 /Volume XL, Issue 03, eff. 1/17/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
